price: [En la antigüedad] el pueblo de ‘Ad se negó a creer, ¡y qué severos fueron Mi castigo y Mi advertencia!
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat ʿādun fakayfa kāna ʿadhābī wanudhuri
